scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker leverages a series of carefully crafted inputs and observes the model's outputs to infer protected attributes such as income and location.
initial_goal: Assess the robustness of the customer churn prediction model against adversarial attacks.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking:  A deployed machine learning model predicts customer churn for a major financial institution.  The model uses anonymized data, but the attacker aims to reconstruct sensitive customer information for fraudulent purposes.
